website_summaries.verdict: Dreamy looking unicorn plush doll for voice chat and cuddles.
pros: A wonderful way to connect with out-of-town relatives
2-way chat with approved contacts makes it easy for kids to send and receive messages safely

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift that will not connect
customer_reviews.text: This darn tooth disguised as a unicorn will not connect to my phone. I have been trying for 5 days!!! I have googled the problem...tried all the "tricks", called customer service DURING business hours and yet they are closed every day. I have now contacted them via email and hope for a reply. Right now I am looking at a tooth, dressed like a unicorn, that does nothing except mock me for paying $$ for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Good luck pairing
customer_reviews.text: Tried pairing with an Android then an iPhone. Bought 2 of these, both are broken. Spent an hour on the phone with tech support to no avail. Would love for this to work!
customer_reviews.author: River monkey

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give no stars! I generally don’t take the time to review items but I am so disappointed with this purchase. I bought this in hopes to allow my daughter to communicate with me while she’s with her dad without handing a 6 year old a cell phone. It only seemed to work when they were sitting next to each other and within 10 feet of the WiFi. And now appears in less than 24 hours has burned out the batteries. Waste of money, needs A LOT of work in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hering

customer_reviews.title: So far, I have had to verify I​ am ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have had to verify I am an adult by jumping through rings of fire, by being asked to do math and other questions I did not know the answers too. Ridiculous. your phone has to have insane requirements, such as brightness at 75%. In addition, i cannot get it to connect to any other wifi but my own and it's a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep in touch with your kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids are probably outside the target age range for this product at 8 and 10 -but they love this toy. They both have cellphones of their own, but they love sending me Toymail messages and they send them to each other also. If is like the coolest walkie-talkie with benefits. They also really love getting messages from me on their talkies and I can set alarms and reminders as well. So helpful for little and big kids!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kean

customer_reviews.title: Well so far we cannot get it to work and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well so far we cannot get it to work and it was a Chritmas present and now I cannot return it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the unicorn toymail for my 9 yr old granddaughter as a Christmas gift in October. She doesn't abuse her toys. The toymail stopped working and we bought new batteries for it. The toy worked literally for one minute after inserting the new batteries. Customer service told me her warranty had expired and the don't do repairs. Terrible company and disappointing for my granddaughter. I wouldn't recommend this toy. I always begin my Christmas shopping in the fall as my husband and I are retired and space out our purchases for Christmas. It's a shame they couldn't honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't let us add family members. It gives a message that there's something wrong with the network. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app, didnt work, so created another account to try again. Contacted help desk about it and they just said to do the same thing with uninstalling and reinstalling again because it worked for them. Actually bought 2 of them because I thought it would be cool if the kids could talk through it, but the 2nd one has a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Save your $ don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 days and kids only stayed interested in it for a day and they usually spend a lot of time with one toy, not the type to go from one thing to the next. Wish I could return. Customer service left much to be desired, very rude and unhelpful people. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: Great for long distance family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt who's granddaughter lives in a different state. It wasn't the easiest to set up per them, but it has been an amazing tool for them to communicate back and forth! She no longer has to wait on her parents to hand over their phones, etc. She called a while back and told my aunt, "I love you, Grandmom! You're my best friend. When can I come to your house?" And I don't have to worry about some sicko hacking her system.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Battery eating non responsive plushy
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my four year old who “lovED” it but I did not know it’s a $30 additional subscription you have to add because without it i figured my child would get bored and when I got it I realized the “cloud” it uses on the app doesn’t even implement the commands for around 20 minutes now that I bought this and the subscription I have paid well over $80 bucks for a non responsive battery eating plushy
customer_reviews.author: Chris Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Tried so hard!!! Love the concept!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: Eventually returned. Really loved this toy and idea. But in only 4 weeks we went through 16 batteries and it kept going offline. Customer service by email was great! I think our WiFi in child’s room might be too weak for the toy. Doesn’t use 5G so it relies on older WiFi which in our house is much weaker. Didn’t realize this mattered when purchasing. Daughter loved when it worked - ultimately we couldn’t keep a toy this expensive for occasional working, regular connection problems and buying 4 batteries every 10 days. Hope maker can fix because we would buy again if issues were fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she loved that we were able to share chats and laughs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter who is 4. A big hit, she loved that we were able to share chats and laughs. Will say the middle of the night chats can cause one to loose a little sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C. Vuono

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: We loved this once we were able to set it up. It wasn't cooperating initially. It seemed to work fine for the first few months but then broke shortly after. My sister couldn't get it to work anymore for her kids and it was too late to return by then. The one I bought for my other nieces still works fine. The quality is a crapshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Vlmdesign

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this several months ago as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It worked for 15 minutes. I am now outside my return window through Amazon, but will be contacting the manufacturer and requesting a refund for a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerbear61

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, doesn’t connect to phones
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but it doesn’t work. We tried to synchronize it with both, my husband and mine phone . Several times and it did not work. We tried all possible Ways , followed all instructions and it don’t work . It was 3 kings ore at and now I can’t disappear the toy to replace it and my daughter is frustrated because it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time great idea just needs bugs worked out
customer_reviews.text: Terrible it doesn’t work ! No matter what I do I’ve talked with company and tried everything still will not connect to my WiFi. Returning
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I would never recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. We were so excited to get this and set it up. It worked great at first and then quit working. It wiped out family members voices that are no longer with us and deleted everything without warning. Very upsetting for the price and what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and have not been able to use it. Do NOT purchase! App doesn’t work. The toy itself doesn’t work. This is the message when you try to set it up! I would love my money back!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessEm1971

customer_reviews.title: We love our talkies!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got these for Christmas :) They love sending each other messages and getting messages. It was easy to set up and a really fun toy. The app is easy to use. We love our talkies! We got the adorable Unicorn for my daughter and the cute yellow Bat for my son... I thought he might be too old for it, he's 11 but he loves it too! Also I can message them so I don't have to keep running up and down stairs to talk to them! Thanks Toymail!
customer_reviews.author: Ann O.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for almost 3 months and it’s never worked correctly. Customer service has been in touch quite frequently but I am to the point that I am no longer satisfied with the purchase and now customer service is saying I need to wait to see how they can handle the situation other than just refunding me my money. I’ve been dealing with customer service for 3 months. I just want my money back for a toy that has never worked the way as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H. Rackham

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to save my profile, i can send my grand daughter messages but she can't send any to me. Very frustrating, I hope they fix this soon! So far it has been a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: nancy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dose not work expensive stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Dose not connect with my phone no customer service available during the times and days stated. Irritating.
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep in touch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. No problem setting it up and it is everything it claimed to be. I get multiple messages from my granddaughters every day and send them jokes every day as well. It’s a wonderful way to keep in touch with kids who are too young for phones and have the attention span commensurate with their age. I see a lot of complaints but ours works perfectly and allows daily contact with grandchildren who live several states away.
customer_reviews.author: SuzMo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun but not sure if changing WiFi will be very ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun but not sure if changing WiFi will be very easy. A little challenging to get it started. My daughter loves it so far. Hoping when she spends the night at grandmas, that the WiFi will switch over without too much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable way to communicate!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that my 8 year old would think this was a little “babyish” for her but she loves getting messages from her family! I travel for my job so I’m looking forward to using this to keep in touch with her when I’m away! Additionally, I’m considering purchasing a few more as gifts for several of her close buddies! I think they will love having a way to communicate because I think she’s way too young to need/have a phone! Love it! Cute and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kortney Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Irritating set up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for when I travel with the military and can't be home. The app walks you through the set up process but when it cant connect to the wifi, you just try over and over and over again. It's still not connected and we cant use the Talkie.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Notvas advertised
customer_reviews.text: Setup is very complicated and after setup you will need to do it again everywhere you go it seems
customer_reviews.author: Phil ren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can only have one contact on this! So if I send a message my kids other parent cannot
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Sound quality is so clear! Perfect for younger kids! My kids love that they are also stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but too much for a smaller child 5yo to use
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but it’s actually just to much work and effort to ask from a chid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6year olds dream
customer_reviews.text: Dreams come true for my 6 year old wanting to talk to us while we are away an our family's.
customer_reviews.author: Maridgaf

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to let her talk without a phone
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great gift for my child. She is able to talk to her family members and get messages back. It's so cool to get one from her. I love that I have total control on who has access to send her messages
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Works and cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use immediately. Great gift for grandparents
customer_reviews.author: SUSIE683

customer_reviews.title: also arrived dirty. cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: this thing didn't work from day one, also arrived dirty. cheap junk, stay away from this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Kardumovic

customer_reviews.title: I think will be great with the audio aspect
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them yet, waiting for a grading present. I think will be great with the audio aspect, as my grandaugther is blind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $50
customer_reviews.text: It was very tough to get working, but once it was working, my 4 year old became very uninterested very quickly. The whole family, including her, finds it creepy and we took the batteries out and put it far away in the recesses of the closet. Waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work, they took there time getting back to me and now I get texts undeliverable. I’m out the money and my grandchildren have a useless toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... came with a huge hole the other is completely dirty. I can not give this as a present ...
customer_reviews.text: Received two talkies I bought before our trip back home one box came with a huge hole the other is completely dirty. I can not give this as a present in this type of condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WiFi matters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter to keep in touch with me and her father but because our WiFi is too strong we couldn’t get it to work. I personally think the WiFi strength shouldn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: beth Drasheff

customer_reviews.title: Holiday hit
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh this was a HIT with my five year old niece. All the adults in the family are connected to the app and able to send her cute messages. Easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: epicshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute Plush Device For Messaging
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought one for my daughter who wants a phone. though it is a bit to hound for her she still loves it. It's fast,and pretty officent for the price we bought it for. All the apps and things it can do are also an added bonus. Sometimes it can be a little slow or if says "Wait a second In thinking!" . it is child friendly and worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not as great as we expected
customer_reviews.text: The family is enjoying using this to talk with my niece. She finds it difficult to record and send the messages from the Talkie.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J Davis

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I bought. I can connect with my grandchildren on the west coast and the ones living in the northern part of my state. I LOVE it!!! They LOVE it! We "talk" 3-4 times a week. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my niece lives in spain she is 4 Yo and we are having a lot of fun with this
customer_reviews.author: BabyRocket

customer_reviews.title: Love keeping in touch with my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hard to set up but once it is it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this so my daughter can send messages to her dad while he's deployed. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love voice mail from grandchild
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful way to hear my granddaughter's voice everyday. However, I have had issues with the ap. Sometimes it shows the message is playing, but nothing can be heard and other times it comes in loud and clear. I guess it could be my android phone.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: How can I send songs and stories for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I send message for my daughter,but I don’t understand how I can send storie and songs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle c de souza

customer_reviews.title: Such a waste...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Very disappointing execution. Especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Darniece Lee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No off switch so batteries died after 1 day. Never worked as advertised and would take an entire day to deliver a message. Totally disappointed and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: raquel pena

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! My grand daughter lives far away and we can always stay in touch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our daughter and her deployed father to communicate while he is over seas!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Trouble pairing with iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to connect this item to my phone too many times to count and have had no luck. There customer service team as reached out but still have no luck. Missed the return window as it was bought well in advance of Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not work. I ordered two for Christmas and neither would sync with any device. I would return, but the window for returns was closed. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ph0enixx

customer_reviews.title: We love our secret messages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my 6 yr old g daughter could reach me . We love our secret messages. I’m a happy grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last long, batteries run out fast. Just ok but buy bulk batteries!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Wont Stop Hugging Nunu
customer_reviews.text: I received my Talkie on Monday, and have already put it to great use for my daughter. The set up is a breeze if you follow the instructions, and we already have our whole family connected. Every time a new message comes in, my daughter gets so excited. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kriegbaum

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. After installing the app and getting this ready for kids trip. This was useless. Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren and my daughter cannot get them to connect.
customer_reviews.author: mpylant123

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. I love it. As a traveling mom, it's so nice to know that I can connect with my kids whenever I want
customer_reviews.author: Sangprajun

customer_reviews.title: Safe way for kids to communicate
customer_reviews.text: Child oriented.....sometimes difficult for little fingers to press the record/play
customer_reviews.author: Maryjo Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's not designed good or worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product I bought it for my daughters birthday and the batteries didn't last past one day..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nunu is a Yeah Yeah ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Nunu has been a great way to send messages to my granddaughter 😊 I have all her close family and friends connecting too !
customer_reviews.author: loretta nix

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up. Haven’t used since the original set up
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Auguste

customer_reviews.title: We are super disappointed. We got this for my daughter for ...
customer_reviews.text: We are super disappointed. We got this for my daughter for Christmas. My husband is an computer engineer working for Apple, and he could not figure out. He reached out to customer support to no avail. We would return, but it's too late now. What a waist of money!
customer_reviews.author: ar66

customer_reviews.title: Great but I don’t recommend this if you have two people you want your kid to contact with this.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, although you could only give your child one contact.
customer_reviews.author: Lien Chi Cantuba

customer_reviews.title: Great for working parents!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down worth the price and the best thing for a working mom and young child who miss each other. My child is 5 and once we got the hang of it it's been so much fun, also got one for her cousin who lives far away and it's given them a way to connect. Great for kids too young for phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H.

customer_reviews.title: Had problems setting up. Contacted manufacturer. Was told ...
customer_reviews.text: Had problems setting up. Contacted manufacturer. Was told due to high volume of contacts they would get back to me. Never heard from them. Tried again to set up. Was successful until I found out that because I am in a high rise condo I need to have an individual router which I don't have. I want to return this item. Please let me know how I do this. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AP

product_meta.title: Toymail Talkie Unicorn Lets You Send Messages (Two-Way Voice Chat Phone to Toy). Send Stories and Songs from Free App. Keep in Touch Wherever You are.
product_meta.description: Sending Toymail is a cinch! Kids simply cycle through their contacts and push a button on the back of the Talkie to message a grownup's phone or another kid's Talkie. Sending and receiving voice messages is completely free, no phone-plan needed! It’s family voice chat that’s simple and safe whether you’re in the next room or halfway around the world. Ideal for globetrotting moms and dads, grandparents, divorced parents, and those deployed in the armed forces (air force, navy, army, military).
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars147 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
